Title: Tech
Presenters: Using vi for Simple Text Editing
All Day Event: 'Tired of suspender wearing- bearded Unix system admins kicking sand in your face? Tired of IDEs and word processors dragging your system to its knees?  Come to this quick tutorial for vi- the light weight- efficient text editor that is available on nearly every system and never suffer from tool bloat or bearded- suspender wearing bullies again. Laptop with vi installed required (Mac and Linux computers have this by default).'
